summary: It makes the bow zooms for skyrim better. also comes with a bow you can duck around with
descriptionHtml:
1st this mod is not to be taken seriously it is meant for fun and that's it

2nd Ok so now Eagle eye has 2 zooms a slightly higher zoom then default while standing and even higher while crouching it still uses half of the stamina. I would recommend [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50528/?]this[/url] if you want to use this mod it is not needed I just like it.

3rd Have fun
author: Bigdaman151
